channel.title: Configuration file on CLIO
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration file on CLIO

item.title: V1 configuration file
item.description: A valid CLIO V1 configuration file is comprised of five different sections: Workflow name: identifies the application workflow composed by multiple application modules. IO_Graph: describes file data dependencies among application modules. Alias: groups under a convenient name a set of files or directories. Permanent: defines which files must be kept on the permanent storage at the end of the workflow execution. Exclude: identifies the files and directories not handled by CAPIO.
